DefaultReaderConfiguration.preQueryCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sbr.FoundThreatR fthR WHERE fthR.FoundThreatID > ?
DefaultReaderConfiguration.queryString: SELECT aeR.ScanAt AS AlertTime, fthR.FoundThreatID, aetlR.TypeDesc, aR.AgentName, aR.AgentIP, aR.AgentDomain, aeR.PolicyName, aeR.ThreatVersion, aeR.Username, ttlR.TraceTypeDesc, alR.ActionDesc, fthR.ThreatName, tcR.CategoryName, tcR.ThreatType, ftrR.[Data], apmlR.MonitorName, apmtlR.MonitorTypeDescription, apkalR.KnownAsDescription, apetlR.EventTypeName, apalR.AuthorityDescription, apeR.EventXml FROM sbr.FoundThreatR fthR INNER JOIN sbr.AgentEventR aeR ON fthR.AgentEventGuid = aeR.AgentEventGuid INNER JOIN sbr.AgentR aR ON aR.AgentGuid = aeR.AgentGuid INNER JOIN sbr.AgentEventTypeLookupR aetlR ON aetlR.EventTypeLookupID = aeR.EventTypeID LEFT JOIN sbr.APEventR apeR ON apeR.AgentEventGuid = fthR.AgentEventGuid LEFT JOIN sbr.APEventTypeLookupR apetlR ON aeR.EventTypeID = 7 AND apetlR.APEventTypeLookupID = apeR.APEventTypeLookupID LEFT JOIN sbr.APMonitorLookupR apmlR ON aeR.EventTypeID = 7 AND apmlR.APMonitorLookupID = apeR.APMonitorLookupID LEFT JOIN sbr.APMonitorTypeLookupR apmtlR ON aeR.EventTypeID = 7 AND apmtlR.APMonitorTypeLookupID = apeR.APMonitorTypeLookupID LEFT JOIN sbr.APKnownAsLookupR apkalR ON aeR.EventTypeID = 7 AND apkalR.APKnownAsLookupID = apeR.APKnownAsLookupID LEFT JOIN sbr.APAuthorityLookupR apalR ON aeR.EventTypeID = 7 AND apalR.APAuthorityLookupID = apeR.APAuthorityLookupID LEFT JOIN sbr.ScanR sR ON aeR.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND sR.AgentEventGuid = aeR.AgentEventGuid LEFT JOIN sbr.ThreatCategoryR tcR ON aeR.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND tcR.CategoryID = fthR.ThreatCategoryID LEFT JOIN sbr.FoundTraceR ftrR ON aeR.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND ftrR.FoundThreatID = fthR.FoundThreatID LEFT JOIN sbr.TraceTypeLookupR ttlR ON aeR.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND ttlR.TraceTypeLookupID = ftrR.TraceTypeLookupID LEFT JOIN sbr.ActionLookupR alR ON aeR.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND alR.ActionLookupID = fthR.ActionLookupID WHERE fthR.FoundThreatID > ? ORDER BY fthR.FoundThreatID

string.toolTipText: Instance name to read from (if the database is on an instance)
Enter the Websense database connection options.
Date and time in milliseconds since epoch

Enable to account for Daylight Savings Time when appropriate

DefaultReaderConfiguration.preQueryCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sbc.SystemMessageC smC WHERE smC.SystemMessageID > ?
DefaultReaderConfiguration.queryString: SELECT smC.EventAt, smC.SystemMessageID, sslC.[Description] AS SubSystem, aC.AgentName, aC.AgentIP, aC.AgentOS, aC.AgentDomain, ssetlC.[Description] AS SystemEventType, smC.[Description] AS SysMessageDesc, smC.MoreInfo FROM sbc.SystemMessageC smC LEFT JOIN sbc.SubSystemLookupC sslC ON sslC.SubSystemLookupID = smC.SubSystemLookupID LEFT JOIN sbc.SubSystemEventTypeLookupC ssetlC ON ssetlC.SubSystemEventTypeLookupID = smC.SubSystemEventTypeLookupID LEFT JOIN sbc.AgentC aC ON aC.AgentGuid = smC.AgentGuid WHERE smC.SystemMessageID > ? ORDER BY smC.SystemMessageID

DefaultReaderConfiguration.preQueryCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIPRE.FOUND_THREAT fth WHERE fth.FoundThreatID > ?
DefaultReaderConfiguration.queryString: SELECT ae.SCANAT AS AlertTime, fth.FOUNDTHREATID, aetl.TYPEDESC_EN, a.AGENTNAME, a.AGENTIP, a.AGENTDOMAIN, p.POLICYNAME_EN, ae.THREATVERSION, ae.USERNAME, ttl.TRACETYPEDESC_EN, al.ACTIONDESC_EN, td.THREATNAME, tc.THREATCATEGORYNAME_EN, tc.THREATTYPE_EN, ftr.[DATA], apml.MONITORNAME_EN, apmtl.MONITORTYPEDESCRIPTION_EN, apkal.KNOWNASDESCRIPTION_EN, apetl.EVENTTYPENAME_EN, apal.AUTHORITYDISPOSITION_EN, ape.EVENTXML FROM VIPRE.FOUND_THREAT fth INNER JOIN VIPRE.AGENT_EVENT ae ON fth.AgentEventGuid = ae.AgentEventGuid INNER JOIN VIPRE.AGENT a ON a.AgentGuid = ae.AgentGuid INNER JOIN VIPRE.AGENT_EVENTTYPE_LOOKUP aetl ON aetl.EventTypeLookupID = ae.EventTypeID INNER JOIN VIPRE.POLICY p ON p.PolicyGUID = a.PolicyGUID LEFT JOIN VIPRE.APEVENT ape ON ape.AgentEventGuid = fth.AgentEventGuid LEFT JOIN VIPRE.AP_EVENTTYPE_LOOKUP apetl ON ae.EventTypeID = 7 AND apetl.APEventTypeLookupID = ape.APEventTypeLookupID LEFT JOIN VIPRE.AP_MONITOR_LOOKUP apml ON ae.EventTypeID = 7 AND apml.APMonitorLookupID = ape.APMonitorLookupID LEFT JOIN VIPRE.AP_MONITORTYPE_LOOKUP apmtl ON ae.EventTypeID = 7 AND apmtl.APMonitorTypeLookupID = ape.APMonitorTypeLookupID LEFT JOIN VIPRE.AP_KNOWNAS_LOOKUP apkal ON ae.EventTypeID = 7 AND apkal.APKnownAsLookupID = ape.APKnownAsLookupID LEFT JOIN VIPRE.AP_AUTHORITY_LOOKUP apal ON ae.EventTypeID = 7 AND apal.APAuthorityLookupID = ape.APAuthorityLookupID LEFT JOIN VIPRE.SCAN s ON ae.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND s.AgentEventGuid = ae.AgentEventGuid LEFT JOIN VIPRE.THREAT_DETAIL td ON ae.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND td.ThreatID = fth.ThreatID LEFT JOIN VIPRE.THREAT_CATEGORY tc ON ae.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND tc.ThreatCategoryID = td.CategoryID LEFT JOIN VIPRE.FOUND_TRACE ftr ON ae.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND ftr.FoundThreatID = fth.FoundThreatID LEFT JOIN VIPRE.TRACETYPE_LOOKUP ttl ON ae.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND ttl.TraceTypeLookupID = ftr.TraceTypeLookupID LEFT JOIN VIPRE.ACTION_LOOKUP al ON ae.EventTypeID IN (0,1,7,8,9) AND al.ActionLookupID = fth.ActionLookupID WHERE fth.FoundThreatID > ? ORDER BY fth.FoundThreatID
